brief_summary.textblock:
This study is to verify the use of a hand held tool to verify the new setting of a
      hydrocephalus shunt (proGAV).  This tool would be used in place of an Xray of the patient's
      head, which is how settings are verified currently.

clinical_study.brief_title: X-Ray Verified Accuracy of the proGAV Verification Instrument

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Implanted with proGAV Requiring adjustment Implant must be palpable under the skin

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Unwilling to consent Implanted within 7 days of inclusion visit

study_pop.textblock: Hydrocephalus patients implanted with proGAV shunt requiring adjustment

clinical_study.official_title: X-Ray Verified Accuracy of the Aesculap - Miethke proGAV Adjustable Shunt Pressure Setting VErification Instrument

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Level of agreement between the proGAV® verification instrument measurement and X-ray control measurements.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
